About Donate

Do you want to help bring new talent into the tech industry?

How it works

You become a mentor to others
We help them get prepared for the job market
Together, we make the tech industry more diverse

How do I become a mentor?

Our teachers and mentors are all volunteers. They play a vital role in supporting and preparing the students as well as possible for landing their first developer job.

Who are the volunteers?

Why HackYourFuture?

We aim to train refugees, asylum seekers, and other disadvantaged groups to become web-developers and empower them by opening the doors to an in-demand job market.

We believe talented newcomers are a great opportunity for society and we are here to give them a helping hand to make use of their potential.

© 2021 HackYourFuture
